projects.title: Digital & Print Identity for a Czech Cyclist

content.body: **Antonie is a young and talented cyclist from the Czech Republic, and this project was created to elevate her digital and personal brand.** It includes both a modern website and a printed portfolio brochure that together highlight her story, achievements, and personality.

The website focuses on key performance statistics, titles, and a dynamic blog section for recent updates, while the printed portfolio offers a more personal look — featuring biometric data, career milestones, and design elements inspired by the Czech tricolor.
The unified visual identity ensures consistency across digital and print, strengthening her professional presentation to teams, sponsors, and fans.
